apps.Name: WhatsApp
apps.Description: WhatsApp Messenger is a messaging app available for Android and other smartphones. WhatsApp uses your phone’s Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to message and call friends and family.

apps.Name: Viber
apps.Description: With Viber, everyone in the world can connect. Freely. More than 606 million Viber users text, make HD-quality phone and video calls, and send photo and video messages worldwide over Wifi or 3G - for free.

apps.Name: Hike
apps.Description: An awesome hike privacy feature which allows you to hide all the chats that you want to keep private from the world and access them only with a password! Your private conversations are now protected and secure from anyone who takes your phone.

apps.Name: BBM
apps.Description: BBM brings you together in the moment with friends and family through instant chats, voice calls, picture sharing, voice notes and more. Download the official version of BBM from BlackBerry now.

apps.Name: Facebook
apps.Description: Keeping up with friends is faster than ever. • See what friends are up to • Share updates, photos and videos • Get notified when friends like and comment on your posts • Play games and use your favorite apps

Catalog.apps: Instagram Instagram is a simple way to capture and share the world's moments. Transform your everyday photos and videos into works of art and share them with your family and friends. 8,000,000,000https://www.youtube.com/embed/s13rYoeex8o https://www.youtube.com/embed/s13rYoeex8o instagram.jpg 4.5/5 Varies with device varies with device

apps.Name: Linkedin
apps.Description: With the LinkedIn Android app, opportunity is just a tap away. Build and nurture your professional network, stay up to date with the latest business and industry news, and find your next dream job.

apps.Name: Snapchat
apps.Description: Enjoy fast and fun mobile conversation! Snap a photo or a video, add a caption, and send it to a friend. They’ll view it, laugh, and then the Snap disappears from the screen – unless they take a screenshot!

apps.Name: Line
apps.Description: LINE reshapes communication around the globe, bringing you closer to your family, friends, and loved ones—for free. With voice and video calls, messages, and a limitless variety of exciting stickers, you’ll be able to express yourselfin ways that you’ve never thought possible.

apps.Name: Hangouts
apps.Description: Use Hangouts to keep in touch. Message friends, start free video or voice calls, and hop on a conversationwith one person or a group.

apps.Name: Skype
apps.Description: Say “hello” to friends and family with an instant message, voice or video call on Skype for free.

apps.Name: Beats
apps.Description: Beats Music is an innovative streaming service that combines the top tier music experts with premium technology to always deliver the right music at the right time.

apps.Name: Saavn
apps.Description: Saavn is unlimited, free access to all your Bollywood, English, Hindi, and Indian regional songs, music, and radio stations – wherever you go.

apps.Name: Spotify
apps.Description: With Spotify, you have access to a world of music. You can listen to artists and albums, or create your own playlist of your favorite songs.

apps.Name: iHeartRadio
apps.Description: iHeartRadio lets you access the world of music and radio in one simple app. Download today to listen to top radio stations, music, news, podcasts, sports, talk, and comedy shows.

apps.Name: Pandora
apps.Description: Great music discovery is effortless and free with Pandora. Just start with the name of one of your favorite artists, songs, genres or composers and we'll do the rest. It's easy to create personalized stations that play only music you'll love.

apps.Name: TuneIn
apps.Description: Listen to your favorite radio stations for free with TuneIn Radio. With over 100,000 stations, TuneIn has the largest free selection of sports, news, music and talk radio from around the world.

apps.Name: Zedge
apps.Description: ZEDGE™ offers free wallpapers, ringtones and notification sounds to easily customize your device. In addition we offer you personalized game recommendations.

apps.Name: Ringdroid
apps.Description: Ringdroid lets you create personal ringtones, alarms, and notification sounds from existing music/audio files and record new ones using your Android device.

Catalog.apps: Jetboom Our galaxy is under attack by alien battle robot army. These space invaders are threatening our space defence by war craft strike. You are the space wolf to save the galaxy by destroying enemy flying battle robots and warships and bring back peace. 5,000 - 10,000 https://www.youtube.com/embed/KlfJS7u-O08 jetboom.jpg 4.7/5 2.3 and up` 1.2.4

apps.Name: Space Chicks
apps.Description: The simple fact is Space Chicks is an awesome endless runner.

apps.Name: Space Defender
apps.Description: An invader's UFO attacked the earth. You must repel the enemy attack. Space defender is very simple but funny shooting game.

apps.Name: Walking Dead
apps.Description: Are you ready to take over Woodbury and put an end to The Governor’s tyranny? Battle between life and the undead in the definitive Walking Dead role-playing game, where your decisions will determine who lives or dies.

apps.Name: Zombie Fire
apps.Description: A first-person shooting game with the topic of zombies! This is a world full of zombies – the graveyard of human.

apps.Name: Cooking Fever
apps.Description: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 11 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant

apps.Name: Cooking Master
apps.Description: Cooking Master is #1 deliciously fun game that lets you feed a host of hungry patrons before they leave in a huff and become a star chef!

apps.Name: Fruit Ninja
apps.Description: Play Fruit Ninja like never before! We've rebuilt the legendary original slicing game from the ground up, adding fresh new gameplay and characters for new and existing fans alike

apps.Name: Kung Fu Warrior
apps.Description: A BAND of THIEVES has KILLED YOUR MASTER! NOW... it's TIME for REVENGE! GRAB POWER-UPS, MASTER COMBOS, and KICK-BUTT in this EPIC ACTION ADVENTURE!

apps.Name: Mortal Kombat X
apps.Description: Experience the over-the-top, visceral fighting of MORTAL KOMBAT X! Bring the power of next-gen gaming to your mobile and tablet device with this visually groundbreaking fighting and card collection game.

apps.Name: WWE Immortals
apps.Description: Play Fruit Ninja like never before! We've rebuilt the legendary original slicing game from the ground up, adding fresh new gameplay and characters for new and existing fans alike

apps.Name: Break the Bricks
apps.Description: Break the Bricks is the #1 smash bricks game available on Google Play and boasts more features than every other arcade game.

apps.Name: Angry Birds
apps.Description: Use the unique powers of the Angry Birds to destroy the greedy pigs' defenses! The survival of the Angry Birds is at stake. Dish out revenge on the greedy pigs who stole their eggs.

apps.Name: Solitaire
apps.Description: Solitaire by MobilityWare is the #1 Solitaire card game on the iPhone, and now it’s on Android! If you like Windows Solitaire, you're going to love this app! This is the same Solitaire game AS SEEN ON TV, and the only Solitaire app that includes Daily Challenges!

apps.Name: FreeCell
apps.Description: Play solitaire games that require skill, strategy and patience to win! A true brain training experience!

apps.Name: Bingo Pop
apps.Description: Use the unique powers of the Angry Birds to destroy the greedy pigs' defenses! The survival of the Angry Birds is at stake. Dish out revenge on the greedy pigs who stole their eggs.

apps.Name: Skip Bo
apps.Description: Skip-Bo™, the popular family card game, officially licensed by Mattel™ is now in Google Play! Test your skills, get into the action, and place all your cards in sequential order

apps.Name: Decked Builder
apps.Description: Decked Builder is the premium deck building app for Magic the Gathering (MTG) -- providing a sleek user interface to research decks, find cards, and then build, price and finally buy the deck that you want.
